title: Senior Electronics Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Electronics Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and developing electronic circuits and systems for our IoT products.

title: Robotics Software Developer
description: Join our robotics team to develop software for autonomous robots. Experience with ROS and Python required.

title: 3D Printing Technician
description: Looking for a skilled 3D printing technician to operate and maintain our fleet of industrial 3D printers.

title: IoT Product Designer
description: Design innovative IoT products that solve real-world problems. Strong background in product design and user experience required.
howToApply: Submit your application on our website

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: Develop firmware for our next-generation smart home devices. Strong C/C++ skills and experience with microcontrollers required.
howToApply: Apply through LinkedIn or our careers page

title: PCB Design Intern
description: Summer internship opportunity for engineering students interested in PCB design. Knowledge of Altium Designer preferred.
howToApply: Send resume and cover letter to internships@circuitmakers.com

title: Mechanical Design Engineer
description: Design mechanical components and assemblies for consumer electronics products. Proficiency in SolidWorks required.
howToApply: Apply on our website with portfolio

title: Freelance Arduino Developer
description: Looking for experienced Arduino developers for short-term projects. Must have portfolio of previous Arduino-based projects.
howToApply: Send examples of your work to projects@makerprojects.com

title: Part-time Electronics Workshop Instructor
description: Teach electronics workshops to beginners and intermediate learners. Weekend availability required.
howToApply: Email your resume and teaching experience to teach@makered.org

title: Full Stack Developer - Maker Community Platform
description: Develop and maintain our maker community platform. Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB required.

title: Fablab Kerala
description: Develop and maintain our maker community platform. Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB required.

title: Fablab Kerala 2
description: Develop and maintain our maker community platform. Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB required.
